description: Garnet is a remote cache-store from Microsoft Research that offers strong performance (throughput and latency), scalability, storage, recovery, cluster sharding, key migration, and replication features. Garnet can work with existing Redis clients.

zh_des: PS5 NOR修饰符是一个易于使用的基于Windows的应用程序，可以重写您的PS5 NOR文件。如果您的NOR已损坏，或者如果您的光盘编辑控制台需要转换为数字以绕过光盘驱动器检查，这将非常有用
name: TheCod3rYouTube /PS5NorModifier
description: The PS5 Nor Modifier is an easy to use Windows based application to rewrite your PS5 NOR file. This can be useful if your NOR is corrupt, or if you have a disc edition console that needs to be converted to digital in order to bypass the disc drive checks
